name: 神明的一天世界(God's One Day World)
minimum_requirements: OS: windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics:  Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics:  Storage: 10 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Thank you for adding the english translation.  Quite a nice story if you can understand what they are on about.  You will fall in love with the chacter drawings. Very well done.  Some parts are confusing on what you are meant to do next progress,
